localizedStrings.startSearchingCoachmarkLeadText: Earn 20 Rewards points when you search 4 times per day with Bing on Microsoft Edge

localizedStrings.informationalSwitchCoachmarkHeadline: Try a new layout to see more news!
localizedStrings.informationalSwitchCoachmarkLeadText: Earn 100 Microsoft Rewards points when you switch to the Microsoft Edge informational layout. Plus, earn 400 more if you keep it for 7 days.
localizedStrings.informationalSwitchCompletionCoachmarkLe: Thanks for switching to the informational layout in Microsoft Edge. Keep it for 7 days and earn 400 more.
localizedStrings.informationalKeepCompletionCoachmarkLead: You just received 400 bonus points on top of the 100 earned earlier for switching to the informational layout.
localizedStrings.accountLinkPromoDesc: Link your personal Microsoft account to your work or school account and start earning gift cards and more.
localizedStrings.accountLinkPromoDisclaimer: You will receive emails about Microsoft Rewards, which include offers about Microsoft and partner products.
localizedStrings.signInUpsellToJoinCMDesc: When you join Rewards, you can redeem points for gift cards and other offers, or donate them to charity.
localizedStrings.signInUpsellToJoinCMDisclm: You'll receive emails about Microsoft Rewards, which include offers about Microsoft and partner products.
localizedStrings.signInUpsellClaimedCMDesc: Stay signed in to Edge for more content tailored just to you.
